channel.title: Eastlink JIRA
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [HST-716] Loaner-Return-EN-residential-Add customer's device back to account- Current device on partial easy Tab

description.p:
This test is to verify that a loaner device can be successfully returned and customer's repair/replaced device can be added back.
Prerequisites:
1. Current device on partial EasyTab
2. Current device- COGECO warehouse location
3. Loaner device -Sold/Assigned
4. The user is in the Update service-Update resource page
5. The customer is in buyers remorse period

item.summary: Loaner-Return-EN-residential-Add customer's device back to account- Current device on partial easy Tab

step.step: Login into RM and Transfer the current device from the 'mention name of warehouse' warehouse to the applicable X warehouse in the General sale available status location
step.result: The Customer's device should in the X warehouse and General sale available status

step.step: In POS, Select the line who is returning the loaner
step.result: Update SIM and Update Device cards should be enabled and details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Change' on the 'Update device' card
step.result: Update device-Replacement policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Repaired/New device' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Current device return policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Return' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Select New device section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the Customer's repair/replace device IMEI and Click retrieve
step.result: The device details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Next'
step.result: Validate Current device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the Loaner device and Click validate
step.result: The loaner device details should be displayed and the Equipment Return Reason field should be displayed

step.step: Select the Equipment Return Reason field and Click Set
step.result: Update Resource' page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Continue to Cart'
step.result: "Shopping cart' page should be displayed with the following details-Customer's device details with price, sales tax and total amountWaive device amount"

step.step: Click on 'Checkout'
step.result: Finish Sale page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale receipt card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's device details with price of the device2. Waive Loaner device price3. Total amount - $0.00"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale Contract card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's device details2. Open easyTab payments

step.step: Login into Resource manager and validate the Customers device inventory status
step.result: Customers repair/replace device should display as assign/Sold

step.step: Validate the Loaner device inventory
step.result: Loaner Device should display in the X warehouse as Returned / returned

step.step: Transfer the Loaner device to the L warehouse as General Sale/Available
step.result: The Loaner device should display in the L warehouse as General Sale/Available

item.title: [HST-715] Loaner-EN-residential-Current device on partial easyTab, in buyers remorse and in warranty period- Loaner device costs >$0

description.p: This test is to verify that a loaner device can be successfully selected and the customer's device can be replaced/repaired

ul.li:
Prerequisites:*
1. Current device on partial easy Tab
2. Customer is in buyers remorse
3. Current device- in warranty period
4. The user is in the Update service-Update resource page
5. The Loaner device is in the loaner warehouse location, general sale/ available
6. The Loaner device costs more than $0

item.summary: Loaner-EN-residential-Current device on partial easyTab, in buyers remorse and in warranty period- Loaner device costs >$0

step.step: Select the service number
step.result: Update SIM and Update Device cards should be enabled and details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Change' on the 'Update device' card
step.result: Update device-Replacement policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Loaner repair' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Select New device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the loaner device and Click Retrieve
step.result: The Loaner device details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Next'
step.result: Validate Current device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the Current device and Click validate
step.result: The current device details should be displayed and the Equipment Return Reason field and Does the customer want to also change the package? Fields should be displayed

step.step: Select the Equipment Return Reason - In Warranty Repair and Click 'Set'
step.result: Update Resource' page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Continue to cart'
step.result: "Shopping Cart' page should be displayed with the following details-New Device(Loaner) details ->$0.00Waived the Loaner device amountNote- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click on 'Checkout'
step.result: "Finish Sale' page should be displayedNote- No payment should be made or needed"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale receipt card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. New device details - $0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale Contract card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's old device details2. Open easyTab payments on the new device section

step.step: Login into Resource manager and validate the Customers device inventory status
step.result: "Current Device Status should display the following in RM- RELEASE Returned / returned (sellable warehouse)TRANSFER In repair / In repair Returns warehouse"

step.step: Transfer the Customer's device to the SV warehouse(In repair/In repair status)
step.result: The customer's device should display as - TRANSFER in repair / repair warehouse SV

step.step: Validate the Loaner device inventory
step.result: "L Warehouse sold / assigned"

item.title: [HST-714] Loaner-EN-residential-Current device on full easy Tab, outside buyers remorse and out of warranty period and loaner device costs >$0

description.p:
This test is to verify that a loaner device can be successfully selected and the customer's device can be replaced/repaired
Pre-requisites
1. Current device on full easy Tab
2. Customer is outside buyers remorse
3. Current device- out of warranty period
4. The user is in the Update service-Update resource page
5. The Loaner device is in the loaner warehouse location, general sale/ available
6. The Loaner device costs more than $0

item.summary: Loaner-EN-residential-Current device on full easy Tab, outside buyers remorse and out of warranty period and loaner device costs >$0

step.step: Select the service number
step.result: Update SIM and Update Device cards should be enabled and details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Change' on the 'Update device' card
step.result: Update device-Replacement policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Loaner repair' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Select New device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the loaner device and Click Retrieve
step.result: The Loaner device details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Next'
step.result: Validate Current device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the Current device and Click validate
step.result: The current device details should be displayed and the Equipment Return Reason field and Does the customer want to also change the package? Fields should be displayed

step.step: Select the Equipment Return Reason - Out of Warranty Repair and Click 'Set'
step.result: Update Resource' page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Continue to cart'
step.result: "Shopping Cart' page should be displayed with the following details-New Device(Loaner) details ->$0.00Waived the Loaner device amountNote- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click on 'Checkout'
step.result: "Finish Sale' page should be displayedNote- No payment should be made or needed"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale receipt card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. New device details - $0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale Contract card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's old device details2. Open easyTab payments on the new device section

step.step: Login into Resource manager and validate the Customers device inventory status
step.result: "Current Device Status should display the following in RM- RELEASE Returned / returned (sellable warehouse)TRANSFER In repair / In repair Returns warehouse"

step.step: Transfer the Customer's device to the SV warehouse(In repair/In repair status)
step.result: The customer's device should display as - TRANSFER in repair / repair warehouse SV

step.step: Validate the Loaner device inventory
step.result: "L Warehouse sold / assigned"

item.title: [HST-713] Loaner-EN-commercial-Current device on partial easyTab, outside buyers remorse and out of warranty period and loaner device costs $0

description.p:
This test is to verify that a loaner device can be successfully selected and the customer's device can be replaced/repaired
Pre-requisites:
1. Current device on partial easyTab
2. Customer is outside buyers remorse
3. Current device- Out of warranty period
4. The user is in the Update service-Update resource page
5. The Loaner device is in the loaner warehouse location, general sale/ available

item.summary: Loaner-EN-commercial-Current device on partial easyTab, outside buyers remorse and out of warranty period and loaner device costs $0

step.step: Select the service number
step.result: Update SIM and Update Device cards should be enabled and details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Change' on the 'Update device' card
step.result: Update device-Replacement policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Loaner repair' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Select New device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the loaner device and Click Retrieve
step.result: The Loaner device details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Next'
step.result: Validate Current device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the Current device and Click validate
step.result: The current device details should be displayed and the Equipment Return Reason field and Does the customer want to also change the package? Fields should be displayed

step.step: Select the Equipment Return Reason - In Warranty Repair and Click 'Set'
step.result: Update Resource' page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Continue to cart'
step.result: "Shopping Cart' page should be displayed with the following details-New Device(Loaner) details -$0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click on 'Checkout'
step.result: "Finish Sale' page should be displayedNote- No payment should be made or needed"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale receipt card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. New device details - $0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale Contract card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's old device details2. Open easyTab payments on the new device section3. No Device protection details"

step.step: Login into Resource manager and validate the Customers device inventory status
step.result: "Current Device Status should display the following in RM- RELEASE Returned / returned (sellable warehouse)TRANSFER In repair / In repair Returns warehouse"

step.step: Transfer the Customer's device to the SV warehouse(In repair/In repair status)
step.result: The customer's device should display as - TRANSFER in repair / repair warehouse SV

step.step: Validate the Loaner device inventory
step.result: "L Warehouse sold / assigned"

item.title: [HST-712] Loaner-EN-residential- Current device on retail price, outside buyers remorse and in warranty period- Loaner device costs >$0

This test is to verify that a loaner device can be successfully selected and the customer's device can be replaced/repaired
Pre requisites-
1. Current device on retail price
2. Customer is outside buyers remorse

4. The user is in the Update service-Update resource page
5. The Loaner device is in the loaner warehouse location, general sale/ available
6. The Loaner device costs more than $0

item.title: [HST-711] Loaner-EN-residential-Change of hierarchy while loaner device is assigned to SA

description.p: This is to verify that the loaner flow works correctly when a change of hierarchy is performed on an SA with a loaner currently assigned.

- Must have MA with active SA open to Update Resource page.
- Must have second MA to move the SA to.

item.summary: Loaner-EN-residential-Change of hierarchy while loaner device is assigned to SA

step.step: Select the service number
step.result: Update SIM and Update Device cards should be enabled and details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Change' on the 'Update device' card
step.result: Update device-Replacement policy' section should be displayed

step.step: Select 'Loaner repair' and Click 'Next'
step.result: Select New device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the loaner device and Click Retrieve
step.result: The Loaner device details should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Next'
step.result: Validate Current device' section should be displayed

step.step: Enter the IMEI of the Current device and Click validate
step.result: The current device details should be displayed and the Equipment Return Reason field and Does the customer want to also change the package? Fields should be displayed"Does the Customer want to change their package?" should default to NO.

step.step: Select the Equipment Return Reason - In Warranty Repair and Click 'Set'
step.result: Update Resource' page should be displayed

step.step: Click 'Continue to cart'
step.result: "Shopping Cart' page should be displayed with the following details-New Device(Loaner) details -$0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click on 'Checkout'
step.result: "Finish Sale' page should be displayedNote- No payment should be made or needed"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale receipt card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. New device details - $0.00Note- If the loaner device costs- the amount should be waived and the total shoud be $0.00"

step.step: Click 'View' on the Sale Contract card
step.result: "The following should be displayed-1. Customer's old device details2. Open easyTab payments on the new device section3. Device protection details"

step.step: Login into Resource manager and validate the Customers device inventory status
step.result: "Current Device Status should display the following in RM- RELEASE Returned / returned (sellable warehouse)TRANSFER In repair / In repair Returns warehouse"

step.step: Transfer the Customer's device to the correct warehouse(In repair/Available status)
step.result: Device is in repair/Available status.

step.step: Validate the Loaner device inventory
step.result: "L Warehouse sold / assigned"

step.step: Perform CoH on SA.
step.result: CoH is performed successfully.

step.step: Follow the Update Device steps to assign the customer's device back to the account.
step.result: Update Device is added to cart.When adding the device back, "Does the Customer want to change their package?" should default to NO.

step.step: Click Continue to Cart.
step.result: Navigated to Shopping Cart. There should be no cost as this is a loaner repair flow, so you will then be taken to the Finish Sale page.

step.step: Validate receipt and service agreement
step.result: Documents are correct.
